channel.title: Redmi Note 10 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Redmi Note 10 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V13.0.5.0.SKGMIXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 10 Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 10 Global

Codename: mojito

Version: V13.0.5.0.SKGMIXM | 12.0

Size: 5.5 GB

MD5: 36ff0ca7ffc746308b1dc9c54800f3dc

Changelog:
[MIUI 13]
New: A new widget ecosystem with app support
Optimization: Improved overall stability
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
[More features and improvements]
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now

Download: Here
